God Understands Exactly the Working of the Human Mind.--The Lord God is exact and infallible in His comprehension. He understands the working of the human mind, the active principles of the human agents He has formed, just how they will be moved upon by the 

782 

objects that come before them, and in what manner they will act under every temptation that can try them, and in every circumstance in which they are placed.
